com.soa.message.Exchange

  • Packages that use Exchange 
    Package Description
    com.soa.activity

    The message package supplies an abstraction of a message.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Abstract implementation of the Exchange interface that can be easily extended for specific implementations.

      Simple implementation of the exchange interface.
